message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's truly an exceptional item, valued at $8,000 by both myself and you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a fantastic opportunity to own a high-quality product at a discounted rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
